channel.title: Cover Media - International Digital News
channel.description: Cover Media - International Digital News Provider

item.title: Jessica Simpsonâ€™s father denies affair
item.description:
Jessica Simpsonâ€™s father Joe has denied cheating after his wife of 34 years filed for divorce.
Tina Simpson entered documents dated September 24 in McLennan County, Texas, according to RadarOnline.
The estranged couple cited â€œdiscord and conflict of personalitiesâ€ as grounds for the split.
Reports surfaced Joe, a former Baptist minister known for managing the careers of daughters Jessica and Ashlee, was having an affair with a 20-year-old male.
â€œJoe got the family together about two months ago and came out of the closet,â€ a source told The National Enquirer.
A representative for the family has denied the explosive claims.
"It is an amicable split and there is no third party involved,â€ the spokesperson told People magazine, continuing, "Any other related allegations are completely false. The family appreciates your respect for their privacy at this time."
Tina and Joe became grandparents again after Jessica gave birth to daughter Maxwell in May.
News of the split follows Joeâ€™s August 4 arrest in Los Angeles for driving under the influence.
The 54-year-old pleaded not guilty to the charge.

item.title: Lady Gagaâ€™s boyfriend: Iâ€™m a lucky guy
item.description:
Lady Gagaâ€™s boyfriend Taylor Kinney has opened up about the coupleâ€™s budding romance.
The 31-year-old Chicago Fire star celebrated his one-year anniversary with the 26-year-old singer in August.
Taylor has been tight-lipped about their relationship in public.
Appearing on the Today show on Wednesday, the actor couldnâ€™t help but gush about the supportive star.
When anchor Hoda Kotb noted it was sweet of Gaga to tweet a promotion for his new television series, he admitted: "I was surprised. I think she's proud of, you know, girlfriend being proud of her boyfriend,â€ adding, â€œShe's been to the set a couple times."
Taylor was reluctant to say much more about the singer. Brushing off her worldwide fame, he insisted sheâ€™s just the girl he fell in love with: Stefani Germanotta.
"I don't have that outside view," he explained. "For whatever reason, it works. I'm a lucky guy."
Taylorâ€™s interview comes weeks after reports surfaced the couple was planning a wedding in Venice, Italy.
The actor did not comment on those claims.

item.title: Snooki reveals Halloween plans
item.description:
Snooki is planning to dress her two-month-old son as Superman this Halloween.
The Jersey Shore star â€“ real name Nicole Polizzi â€“ and fiancÃ© Jionni LaValle welcomed baby Lorenzo in August.
The 24-year-old has revealed the superhero-themed fancy dress plans her little family has for October 31.
"I'm going to be Wonder Woman. He's [Jionni] going to be Captain America and Lorenzo's going to be Superman," she told the Today show.
Snooki was famed for her partying and alcohol-fuelled antics during her time on Jersey Shore.
Now she is a mother, the reality TV star says she has calmed down and prefers to spend time with her son.
"It's crazy. You know me! I just always want to have good time and now it's just like, 'I love my baby. What can I do with him?' It's just totally different,â€ she explained.
"I definitely partied for, like, three people for my entire life, so I feel like, I have a family, I have a baby now, and I feel like I have a new chapter now. I love it."

item.title: Justin Timberlake: Biel was beautiful bride
item.description:
Justin Timberlake says seeing Jessica Biel in her wedding dress was â€œthe most beautiful thingâ€.
The pair wed in front of family and friends at a private ceremony in southern Italy on Friday.
Jessica, 30, wore a custom-made, pink Giambattista Valli Haute Couture gown during the nuptials at the Borgo Egnazia resort in Puglia.
"It was a really special evening," Justin gushed to People magazine. â€œ[Jessica was] the most beautiful thing I have ever seen.â€
"It was a total fantasy experience," Jessica added.
The nuptials included a touching moment where Justin, 31, serenaded his long-term love as she walked down the aisle in her stunning dress.
Justin wore a Tom Ford tuxedo as he played the guitar and sang to Jessica.
"It was an original piece I wrote specifically for the evening and for her," he explained of the song.
The couple kicked off their celebrations with a party and firework display at Cala Masciola beach last Wednesday.
The festivities were laid on for guests who travelled to Italy, including singer Timbaland and Jessicaâ€™s 7thHeaven co-star Beverley Mitchell.
"It was a lot to ask of them to travel, so we figured we'd give our guests a good party!" Justin explained.

item.title: Demi Moore â€˜reunites with daughterâ€™
item.description:
Demi Moore has reportedly reunited with her estranged daughter Rumer Willis.
The actress apparently received a phone call from 24-year-old Rumer in late September asking if they could bury the hatchet.
This comes after Rumer's boyfriend, actor Jayson Blair, put pressure on her to rekindle things with Demi.
â€œJayson has been telling Rumer for ages that she needed to forgive her mom and move on,â€ a friend told the magazine Star. â€œShe finally gave in and made the call.
â€œHe knew that deep down Rumer really missed her mother and wasnâ€™t going to be happy until they made up.â€
The magazine claims a source revealed how the pair met in person following the call from Rumer. The reunion was reportedly tearful and the publication states that things are still strained between the mother-daughter duo.
Rumer's relationship with her mom started to deteriorate after Demi announced she was splitting from her husband Ashton Kutcher last year.
The close relationship between her daughter and Ashton was apparently at the heart of their disagreements.
It was reported earlier this year that Demi's other two daughters Tallulah and Scout â€“ who were also fathered by Demiâ€™s ex-husband Bruce Willis - had cut contact with the troubled actress.

item.title: Taylor Swift relies on â€˜wiseâ€™ brother
item.description:
Taylor Swift goes to her â€œwiseâ€ younger brother when she needs advice.
The country singer is known for opening up about her relationships through candid song lyrics, such as her latest hit We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together.
Other than through her songs, the 22-year-old rarely talks about her private life publicly, and instead confides in her brother Austin, who is two years her junior.
â€œI have my girlfriends and we talk about everything. But one person who I go to for advice, who is a guy, is my brother,â€ she explained to Australian radio hosts Kyle and Jackie O.
â€œHe gives me really straightforward advice. Nine times out of ten, when I say, â€˜What should I do?â€™ he says, â€˜Well, what do you want to do?â€™ That answer is always really easy; what you want to do is what you should do. Heâ€™s younger, itâ€™s so weird, heâ€™s so wise!â€
Taylor has had her share of tumultuous relationships in the past, including a brief romance with bad boy musician John Mayer.

item.title: Kelly Osbourne is â€˜selfishâ€™ birthday girl
item.description:
Kelly Osbourne has joked she is â€œselfishâ€ for snubbing David Furnishâ€™s invite to his birthday party.
Sir Elton Johnâ€™s husband is celebrating turning 50 in style with a week-long star-studded bash, but the TV presenter has decided to focus on her own special day instead.
Kelly, the daughter of British rocker Ozzy Osbourne, is jetting to the UK to spend her 28th anniversary next Saturday with her pals.
â€œI was invited to all of the festivities but unfortunately every year I have to pick between going to Davidâ€™s birthday or having my own birthday because we are one day apart. So Iâ€™ve decided that Iâ€™m actually going to come home [to the UK], I canâ€™t wait,â€ she told UK TV show Daybreak. â€œI know itâ€™s pretty selfish of me and heâ€™s going to be mad but I want to see my friends. And I canâ€™t wait to have some yummy English food!â€
Kelly also joked that she doesnâ€™t feel like a woman in her late twenties.

item.title: Snoop Dogg: Reggae feels good
item.description:
Snoop Dogg insists he couldnâ€™t ever stop rapping.
The music star is known for his hip-hop tunes but recently announced he is going in a new direction and has changed his name to Snoop Lion. His new album Reincarnated has more of a reggae feel, but Snoop has promised fans he hasnâ€™t turned his back on his musical roots forever.
â€œTo be or not to be? That is the question. Or as we say - to G or not to G? That is the question. We'll see. I don't think I could ever stop,â€ he told ET Online when asked if he will ever release another rap album. â€œI just think that, right now, this is what feels good to me. I've been doing rap ever since I've been a rapper. So that's probably 1978 when I started and it's 2012... And to be able to take what I learned from rapping and be able to spin it into reggae music is beautiful because there's a little rap in reggae and there's a little reggae in rap, so it's all complementary.â€

item.title: Ellie Goulding: I used to clean menâ€™s toilets
item.description:
Ellie Goulding says that her worst job before becoming a pop star was cleaning toilets.
The 25-year-old British singer recently released her second album, Halcyon, and is enjoying success on both sides of the Atlantic.
But she tells MTV News as they promote their latest scripted series, Underemployed, that she had it rough before becoming successful.
â€œWell I grew up in a village and down the road was a pub called the Royal George and I used to clean the toilets,â€ she revealed of her unglamorous job. â€œMenâ€™s toilets, mainly.â€
Meanwhile music superstar Bruno Mars says he tried a different part of the industry before getting his record deal, but things didnâ€™t turn out so well.
â€œI was 18-years-old. The worst job I ever had was I applied to be a DJ at the mall at the Beverly Center,â€ Bruno recalled.
â€œSo I showed up to the Beverly Center with my friendâ€™s records and I broke their record player.â€
NSYNCâ€™s Lance Bass also revealed that he had to dress up as Poo Fu the Dog at his local mall in Mississippi â€œbut the worst thing about it was inside the suit it was like 120 degrees and I would just sweat my a*s off every day,â€ he overshared.

item.title: Daniel Craig and his Bond girl dazzle at London premiere of Skyfall
item.description:
It was a Royal affair in London on Tuesday night as Daniel Craig looked the epitome of 007 for the premiere of the latest James Bond movie, Skyfall.
He was accompanied by co-stars Naomie Harris, Berenice Marlohe, Javier Bardem and Ralph Fiennes at the event held at the Royal Albert Hall which was also attended by Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall.
Fans were whipped into frenzy with the sound of a drumming marching band at the start of the evening and enthusiastically screamed at the Hollywood stars as they arrived.
â€œOnly two weeks ago I was in a dark room finishing it off!â€ Sam Mendes told Britainâ€™s Daily Mirror about his last minute director duties.
Meanwhile, Naomie told premiere host David Walliams that her character Eve is a â€œbad a**e.â€
â€œShe thinks sheâ€™s a match for Bond at the beginning of the movie at least,â€ Naomie said of the eagerly anticipated action film. â€œI donâ€™t remember the first time I watched a Bond movie as I grew up watching them â€“ this one could be my favorite though.â€
Daniel told reporters that he â€œtried not to think aboutâ€ the importance of the release of this movie which comes on the 50th anniversary of the hit franchise.

item.title: Ferns named after Lady Gaga
item.description:
Dr. Kathleen Pryer has named a family of ferns after Lady Gaga.
The scholar is a professor of biology at Duke University and is also the director of the campusâ€™ herbarium.
Dr. Pryer has been conducting research on a specific family of plants for quite some time and has published her findings on these pteridophytes, which include two new varieties, in Systematic Botany.
The academic believes that this strain of vegetation encapsulates Gagaâ€™s flamboyance.
"We study, in particular, a group of ferns called the cheilanthoid ferns, there are about 500 or 600 of them, and many of them tend to be more adapted to living in desert situations, which is unusual for ferns," Dr. Pryer told MTV News.
"So often, people give names in honor of old white guys that have worked on ferns for a long time, but we didn't want to do that. And there were so many things about these 'Gaga ferns' that we decided to name the new genus after her, to celebrate diversity."

item.title: Robert Downey Jr.: I love when wifeâ€™s happy
item.description:
Robert Downey Jr. is keen on â€œdoing his partâ€ for his family.
The 47-year-old actor is currently married to his wife Susan and the couple share eight-month-old son Exton together. Robert is also father to 19-year-old son Indio from a previous relationship.
The star honors his role as patriarch.
"I think the best part about being a dad is when your wife isn't mad at you, which means you're doing your part," Robert laughed to ET Online.
Robert is currently filming Iron Man 3.
The thespian is getting used to his superhero costume.
"[It's] more comfortable every time," Robert explained.
"They keep designing it to make it more sustainable so we can do more stuff in it."
Gwyneth Paltrow also stars in the sequel.
Robert has a fantastically strong friendship with the actress.
"He's like my big brother at this point," he joked.
Iron Man 3 will be released in theaters May 3 2013.

item.title: Gerard Butler content with sobriety
item.description:
Gerard Butler thinks itâ€™s â€œbest not toâ€ drink or smoke cigarettes.
The 42-year-old Scottish actor has been sober for around 15 years.
Gerard doesnâ€™t even think about his former vices in the same light.
"If you drank like I did [in the past] you'd go 'No, probably best not to,â€™ â€ he told USA Today.
"Once you've been introduced to the art of social drinking you appreciate, 'Well, this is relaxing.' It gets you in the mood. But when you haven't had a drink for a long time, you forget you ever had that. I was [also] a big smoker. I haven't smoked in a long time."
Although Gerard is sober, he still knows how to have a good time.
He doesnâ€™t feel like he needs to be intoxicated to enjoy himself.
"Listen, I'm a guy from Scotland," he explained.
"I'm fun-loving, I love people. I love to go out but I love to stay in."
Gerard portrays legendary surfer Frosty Hesson in forthcoming biopic Chasing Mavericks, which will be released in theaters this weekend.

item.title: Nelly: Bus raid remains alarming
item.description:
Nelly is â€œhurtâ€ by the betrayal of his colleague.
The 37-year-old Grammy-winner, real name Cornell Iral Haynes, Jr., was detained in Texas at a border patrol checkpoint in Sierra Blanca on October 11 after law enforcement officials found heroin, marijuana and a loaded gun in his vehicle.
Police sources said passenger Brian Keith Jones confessed the drugs and gun were his and was placed under arrest.
Nelly was oblivious to the illegal load his vehicle was carrying and is upset with Brian.
"I think it's always alarming. I think in this case it's really alarming when you find yourself in a situation that you didn't put yourself in," he told MTV News.
"That's the only thing that I think is baffling, and I think that's the part that hurts the most."
Nelly has worked hard on his image and doesnâ€™t want it to be sullied by drugs.
The musician is worried that his career will be adversely affected by the scandal.
"For 14 years, I made my perception what I wanted to make my perception and now my perception may be slightly changed," Nelly said.

item.title: Eva Longoria splits from beau
item.description:
Eva Longoria and her athlete boyfriend Mark Sanchez have called it quits.
The 37-year-old actress and the 25-year-old New York Jets football player split after spending just months together.
A representative for Mark confirms that the pair broke up amicably.
"Mark adores and respects Eva," the rep told Us Weekly magazine.
"It really was about scheduling more than anything else. They will remain close friends."
Apparently the former couple are still on great terms.
Eva and Mark agree that their relationship didnâ€™t work primarily because of conflicting agendas.
"There was no drama," a source told the publication.
"They just have completely different schedules and lifestyles."
Eva started dating Mark a month after her split from Eduardo Cruz in June.
The star two failed marriages behind her, divorcing General Hospital star Tyler Christopher in 2004. Eva married Tony Parker in 2007, but filed for divorce when the San Antonio Spurs star cheated on her.

item.title: Spearsâ€™ ex manager: I never provided stimulants
item.description:
Britney Spearsâ€™ ex-manager Sam Lufti declared in court Tuesday that he never supported the starâ€™s alleged use of amphetamines.
Sam has sued the pop princess and her parents for defamation and breach of contract.
Last week he claimed that his professional relationship with Britney and her family turned sour due to her abuse of Adderall.
TMZ reports that while Sam took the stand during trial Tuesday, he was adamant that he never in any way enabled Britney to use drugs.
He confessed that he does in fact have a prescription for Adderall to treat his Attention Deficit Disorder, but Sam insists that he never shared the pills with Britney.
The former employee was accused by Britneyâ€™s mother Lynne of illegally providing the medication to the singer.
The trial remains in session and Sam will return to the stand following the courtâ€™s lunch break.
The civil trial commenced last Thursday.
Sam is seeking 15 per cent of Britneyâ€™s income over several months between 2007 and 2008.

item.title: Lindsay Lohan advised against restraining order
item.description:
Lindsay Lohanâ€™s legal team believes taking out a restraining order against her father would have â€œdisastrousâ€ ramifications.
The Mean Girls actressâ€™ dad Michael showed up at the actressâ€™ Beverly Hills, California home last week amid concerns over her alleged hard-partying.
Police were called to the scene and Michael left the property.
Lindsay is now believed to be seeking a protection order to prevent him from making another attempt, but her aides are against this action.
"Lindsay is being told by her lawyers that it's a disastrous idea for her to try and get a restraining order against her father, Michael Lohan,â€ a source told Radar Online.
â€œFirst of all, there is no guarantee that a judge would grant a restraining order against Michael. Michael did show up at her house and try and stage an intervention, because he believes that she is in immediate danger because of her alleged drug and alcohol addiction. That is hardly a form of harassment.
"Secondly, if Lindsay were to petition for a restraining order, this story will just keep going, making it a never ending media cycle of stories about the Lohan family drama."

item.title: Wyatt: Kidman is gorgeous Grace Kelly
item.description:
Lynn Wyatt believes that Nicole Kidman is â€œbeautiful inside and out.â€
The 77-year-old socialite was a dear friend of Grace Kelly Princess of Monaco before the Hollywood legend passed away in 1982.
Nicole depicts the royal in upcoming biopic Grace of Monaco and Lynn couldnâ€™t be happier about the casting.
"First of all, I know Nicole Kidman. There is nobody more gorgeous," Lynn Wyatt told People magazine Monday at the 30th Anniversary Princess Grace Awards Gala hosted by the Princess Grace Foundation-USA in New York City.
"She's beautiful inside and out, and she's very sweet. She's very nice â€“ and she's caring. I think she would be perfect."
Although Lynn thinks Nicole is fantastic, she misses her friend Grace.
The socialite believes that Grace was a phenomenal human being.
"You know, when you're good friends with someone you know them more inside than out, but her cheekbones, and just the way her eyes [looked], everything under that big hat, she was just so beautiful," she recalled.
"I just said 'Grace, forgive me, but I'm staring at you.' And she just said, 'Oh, Lynn.' "

item.title: Timberlake ill on wedding day
item.description:
Justin Timberlake reportedly â€œwasnâ€™t feeling wellâ€ at all the day of his wedding to Jessica Biel.
The 31-year-old singer-turned-actor and the 30-year-old actress tied the knot in Italy at the Borgo Egnazia hotel on October 19.
Although Justin was in a rather poorly state, he still made it a point to show up and celebrate with his loved ones.
"Justin wasn't feeling well all week and on his wedding day," a source told Us Weekly magazine.
"They shut the place down! They had a big night at the bar where everyone went crazy -- but Justin wasn't feeling great.â€
Justin didnâ€™t go overboard during the festivities due to his illness.
He managed to have a good time nonetheless.
"Justin was in a good mood," the source detailed. "He had fun."
Producer Timbaland, comedian Andy Samberg, actress Beverly Mitchell and music manager Johnny Wright were amongst the wedding attendees.
Apparently Jessica and Justin wanted to keep the ceremony intimate.
"The biggest surprise to everyone was that it was such a small group and not star-studded," the insider said.
"Justin stayed with his family most of the time. They had a schedule of everything for guests to do throughout the weekend."

item.title: Friends creator: We contemplated ending
item.description:
Friends creator David Crane has revealed Ross and Rachel almost ended up apart when the final season was being written.
Throughout the ten seasons of the popular TV show, Rachel Green and Ross Gellerâ€™s on-off romance kept viewers hooked. Audiences were thrilled to see the pair finally come together as a happy family with their daughter Emma.
However, David has confessed that scriptwriters considered keeping the romance open-ended, so viewers would be left guessing.
â€œThere was always that question about do we get Ross and Rachel together? At first we thought that [getting them together] seems so expected,â€ he explained in a clip from the Friends Blu-ray set. â€œ[We thought about a] vague, â€˜They are not together but there is hope for the future.â€™ And then we were like, â€˜Screw that! People have waited ten years for this! Letâ€™s give them what they want and letâ€™s do it really well.â€™â€
In the final episodes, Ross begged Rachel to stay in New York City with him after she landed a new job in Paris. Despite initially deciding she wanted to relocate, Rachel changed her mind at the last minute and agreed to give her relationship with Ross another shot.
